input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
Powell Heavy Metal Pewter Full Over Full Bunk Bed

Item specifications:
Made to withstand the adventures and pressures of a youth environment
Crafted of pewter metal
Full bed over a full bed
Sturdy step ladder
Some assembly required
Two beds in the space for one


Product description:
input_text.Response A: This heavy-duty metal full over full bunk bed is the perfect addition to your child's bedroom. The bed is crafted of pewter metal and made to withstand the adventures and pressures of a youth environment. The upper bed is a full bed, and the lower bed is also a full bed, so you get two beds in the space for one! Sturdy step ladder for easy access to the upper bed. Some assembly is required.
input_text.Response B: The Heavy Metal Collection is made to withstand all of the adventures and pressures of a youth environment. Crafted of Pewter Metal, this piece easily complements the ever changing dcor of a childs room. Two beds in the space for one, this piece features a full size bed above a full size bed. A sturdy step ladder provides easy up and down access to the top bunk. Some assembly required.

label_annotations.feedback: response b sounds odd when saying full size bed twice in a sentence
